Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Online course was a simple way to get this class done. Super easy grader and very understanding when the program had technical issues throughout the semester. I've emailed her a couple times and got very quick responses.
Took it online pretty easy and lenient grader. Very understanding about technical issues with program. Responds to emails pretty fast.

I am taking her online class. She is more than happy to answer your questions if you have any. Clear work to do. None of it is hard. Just get it done and you will pass the class. Take this class, it's so easy and it is not stressful at all. It's also a great class to take if you need to take a lot of classes at the same time.
Easy A. As long as you actually did the work on time you got credit, half the time she didn't read it or else I would have done worse.
rating_tags: Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Would take again

comment: I took her for online wellness and her class was extremely easy. Just do the modules correctly and it will be a very easy A. No final.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: Extremely caring professor. She provides material that is straight forward and is willing to work with you. Although we didn't have her in a classroom environment, you could tell that she cares and has a passion for her course. Easy A, take her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Would take again

comment: She is very straightforward about the assignments which are all to be completed online with 2 weeks. Very few opportunities for extra credit but assignments are so easy that you wont really need it. Do NOT miss due dates she does not allow late work. Otherwise she is a joy to have teaching you.
rating_tags: Caring--Clear grading criteria--Get ready to read

comment: Clear workload and easily navigated course! Assignments are pretty simplistic with two weeks in between each module. Definitely an easy course.

Very easy class, especially if you are a busy student taking upper-level courses. You can easily finish a module in under two hours (minus check-ins). Check-ins are relatively time-consuming/tedious and require you to write a few sentences here and there. Overall, easy class, turn in your work, and you will make an A!

Mrs. Barrett-William's online wellness class is super easy. The hardest part is the check-ins but they more time consuming then they are hard. She's clear about what she expects and you can complete everything within a day. Take her.
Great teacher and a very easy class, would take again in a heartbeat!
This a required class for KSU.  Easy A. I did learn a lot. Easy A.

Took online Wellness course during summer.  There were a lot of assignments including exercising and recording results.  The check in statements were lengthy and detailed.  Very clear rubrics for grading.  Offered feedback when needed.  A lot of work.
